AI Description: cce-mixed is a software package designed for performing calculations in the framework of many-body perturbation theory for the electronic structure of solids. It focuses on the GW approximation, self-energy calculations, and the solution of the Bethe-Salpeter equation for optical excitations.
Core Features:
1. GW approximation calculations for electronic structure analysis
2. Self-energy calculations
3. Bethe-Salpeter equation solutions for optical excitations
4. Solid-state materials electronic structure analysis
